chat.creative_mode_test: You joined the world in creative. Click this text if you want to go to a superflat test world.
chat.out_of_backrooms.0: You tried to build a portal to ungenerated terrain.
chat.out_of_backrooms.1: Build a portal from the overworld to the nether
tip.right_click.sculk: You can't place blocks on sculk!
tip.right_click.sculk_scrubber: Try to place the Sculk Scrubber on the side of a non-sculk block to get it in the right position.
tip.right_click.scrubber: You need to place the scrubber on sculk!
